amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a study on the impacts pine beetles have in the Northeastern region of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
